### Archiving Everything!

A new tab has been added featuring three sections:

- **ğŸ”Media Archive:** Stores all official ENreco media in one placeâ€”no more endless searching.
- **ğŸ¬Clips Archive:** A curated collection of fan-made clips, organized by oshi for easy browsing.
- **ğŸ“Text Archive:** Contains written works from talents, lore entries, and your favoriteâ€”fanfics.

### Other Improvements

- Redesigned fanart gallery with a cleaner, more intuitive layout.
- Added a small pop-up that shows what song is currently playing.
- Updated Justice members' icons
- Improved mobile layout and text readbility

## âœï¸ QoL Improvements

- Added **â€œPrevious Dayâ€** and **â€œNext Dayâ€** buttons to the end of each card
